service.tut.pori.facebookjazz

Class FacebookJazzDAO

  • java.lang.Object
    • core.tut.pori.dao.SQLDAO
      • service.tut.pori.facebookjazz.FacebookJazzDAO

  • public class FacebookJazzDAO
extends SQLDAO
    DAO for storing facebook summarization information. Note that this class stores details about the user's preferences for the summarization, the actual results are stored as media objects, using MediaObjectDAO.
